article: Two sons worked for their father on the family farm. For some years, the  _  brother had been given more  _  to do than the older one. The older brother couldn't  _  why, so one day he asked his father the  _  why he always trusted his younger brother to do more work. The father said, "Go to the Kelly's  _  nearby and see if they have any  _  to sell." The older brother soon  _  with the answer, "Yes, they have five ducks they can  _  to us." That father then said, "Good, now please ask them the  _  or the ducks." The son returned, "The ducks are PS10 each." The father asked, "  _  can they deliver the ducks?" The younger brother soon returned with the  _  , "Yes, they have  _  ducks for PS10 each,  _  ten ducks for PS8 each; and they can  _  them tomorrow --I asked them to deliver the five ducks  _  told them not to in the next hour. We agreed that if I wanted the  _  five ducks I could buy them at PS6 each." The father  looked at  the older son, who nodded his head. He now  _  why his brother was given more work.
